org.apache.camel.component.hl7

Class CustomHL7MLLPCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.component.hl7.HL7MLLPCodec
      • org.apache.camel.component.hl7.CustomHL7MLLPCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.mina.filter.codec.ProtocolCodecFactory

    public class CustomHL7MLLPCodec
extends org.apache.camel.component.hl7.HL7MLLPCodec
    Custom HL7 MLLP codec. Ability to set the HapiContext, e.g. to use some other ModelClassFactory. Also allows to set error handling in case of malformed input.
